item.title: Help with editting xp
item.dc:creator: @Pwnage_Sh0w Pwnage Sh0w
item.description:
@Pwnage_Sh0w wrote:

Here is what you do…

Open up client.java and search for TotalExp

Just search it 2 times and you will see something like this…

[code] if (FightType == 1) // Accurate
{
TotalExp = (double) (1000000 * hitDiff);
TotalExp = (double) (TotalExp * CombatExpRate);
addSkillXP((int) (TotalExp), playerAttack);
} else if (FightType == 2) // Agressive
{
TotalExp = (double) (1000000 * hitDiff);
TotalExp = (double) (TotalExp * CombatExpRate);
addSkillXP((int) (TotalExp), playerStrength);
} else if (FightType == 4) // Defensive
{
TotalExp = (double) (1000000 * hitDiff);
TotalExp = (double) (TotalExp * CombatExpRate);
addSkillXP((int) (TotalExp), playerDefence);
} else if (FightType == 3) // Controlled
{
TotalExp = (double) (1000000 * hitDiff);
TotalExp = (double) (TotalExp * CombatExpRate);
addSkillXP((int) (TotalExp), playerStrength);
}
TotalExp = (double) (1000000 * hitDiff);
TotalExp = (double) (TotalExp * CombatExpRate);
addSkillXP((int) (TotalExp), playerHitpoints);
actionTimer = 7;
server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].animNumber = server.npcHandler.GetNPCBlockAnim(
server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].npcType);
[end]

Change all the numbers that are in (1000000 * hitDiff); to the amount exp you want.

*Note: The numbers in (1000000 * hitDiff); are every 1 hit. so in this one right here its 1000000 exp every time u hit a 1.

**Note: This is only for Combat Exp, I dont know how to change the skills exp.

Hope this helps
[/code][br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 24, 2008, 09:42:32 pm[/size][hr]lol i dont know how to end the code thing…

Read full topic
